verses.text_plain: From whence come wars and fightings among you? come they not hence, even of your lusts that war in your members?
verses.verse_html: 1From whence come wars and fightings among you? come they not hence, even of your lusts that war in your members?

verses.text_plain: Ye lust, and have not: ye kill, and desire to have, and cannot obtain: ye fight and war, yet ye have not, because ye ask not.
verses.verse_html: 2Ye lust, and have not: ye kill, and desire to have, and cannot obtain: ye fight and war, yet ye have not, because ye ask not.

verses.text_plain: Ye ask, and receive not, because ye ask amiss, that ye may consume it upon your lusts.
verses.verse_html: 3Ye ask, and receive not, because ye ask amiss, that ye may consume it upon your lusts.

verses.text_plain: Ye adulterers and adulteresses, know ye not that the friendship of the world is enmity with God? whosoever therefore will be a friend of the world is the enemy of God.
verses.verse_html: 4Ye adulterers and adulteresses, know ye not that the friendship of the world is enmity with God? whosoever therefore will be a friend of the world is the enemy of God.

verses.text_plain: Do ye think that the scripture saith in vain, The spirit that dwelleth in us lusteth to envy?
verses.verse_html: 5Do ye think that the scripture saith in vain, The spirit that dwelleth in us lusteth to envy?

verses.text_plain: But he giveth more grace. Wherefore he saith, God resisteth the proud, but giveth grace unto the humble.
verses.verse_html: 6But he giveth more grace. Wherefore he saith, God resisteth the proud, but giveth grace unto the humble.

verses.text_plain: Submit yourselves therefore to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.
verses.verse_html: 7Submit yourselves therefore to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

verses.text_plain: Draw nigh to God, and he will draw nigh to you. Cleanse your hands, ye sinners; and purify your hearts, ye double minded.
verses.verse_html: 8Draw nigh to God, and he will draw nigh to you. Cleanse your hands, ye sinners; and purify your hearts, ye double minded.

verses.text_plain: Be afflicted, and mourn, and weep: let your laughter be turned to mourning, and your joy to heaviness.
verses.verse_html: 9Be afflicted, and mourn, and weep: let your laughter be turned to mourning, and your joy to heaviness.

verses.text_plain: Humble yourselves in the sight of the Lord, and he shall lift you up.
verses.verse_html: 10Humble yourselves in the sight of the Lord, and he shall lift you up.

verses.text_plain: Speak not evil one of another, brethren. He that speaketh evil of his brother, and judgeth his brother, speaketh evil of the law, and judgeth the law: but if thou judge the law, thou art not a doer of the law, but a judge.
verses.verse_html: 11Speak not evil one of another, brethren. He that speaketh evil of his brother, and judgeth his brother, speaketh evil of the law, and judgeth the law: but if thou judge the law, thou art not a doer of the law, but a judge.

verses.text_plain: There is one lawgiver, who is able to save and to destroy: who art thou that judgest another?
verses.verse_html: 12There is one lawgiver, who is able to save and to destroy: who art thou that judgest another?

verses.text_plain: Go to now, ye that say, To day or to morrow we will go into such a city, and continue there a year, and buy and sell, and get gain:
verses.verse_html: 13Go to now, ye that say, To day or to morrow we will go into such a city, and continue there a year, and buy and sell, and get gain:

verses.text_plain: Whereas ye know not what shall be on the morrow. For what is your life? It is even a vapour, that appeareth for a little time, and then vanisheth away.
verses.verse_html: 14Whereas ye know not what shall be on the morrow. For what is your life? It is even a vapour, that appeareth for a little time, and then vanisheth away.

verses.text_plain: For that ye ought to say, If the Lord will, we shall live, and do this, or that.
verses.verse_html: 15For that ye ought to say, If the Lord will, we shall live, and do this, or that.

verses.text_plain: But now ye rejoice in your boastings: all such rejoicing is evil.
verses.verse_html: 16But now ye rejoice in your boastings: all such rejoicing is evil.

verses.text_plain: Therefore to him that knoweth to do good, and doeth it not, to him it is sin.
verses.verse_html: 17Therefore to him that knoweth to do good, and doeth it not, to him it is sin.
